description: The Mountain Hardwear Logo™ Pullover Hoody draws on the fan-favorite layer, simplifies it, and adds an eco edge. With nothing but the Hardwear nut on an ultra-soft, 100% organic cotton fabric, you not only get a modern, refined version of the hoody that's been everywhere—you gain that good feeling of doing good for the planet.
name: Mountain Hardwear Mountain Hardwear Logo Pullover Hoody - Mens
